summary: This is an email from attorney Christian Everdell to Judge Nathan and counsel, submitting under seal the renewed bail motion and accompanying exhibits (O, P, S, W, X) in the case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell. It is a procedural filing in the criminal case against Maxwell.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: Attorney from Cohen & Gresser LLP who is submitting the renewed bail motion and exhibits under seal to the court and counsel.

persons.name: Mark S. Cohen
persons.context: Attorney at Cohen & Gresser LLP, copied on the email regarding the sealed bail motion submission.

persons.name: Bobbi Sternheim
persons.context: Defense attorney for Ghislaine Maxwell, copied on the email regarding the sealed bail motion submission.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: Attorney, likely part of the defense team, copied on the email regarding the sealed bail motion submission.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: Attorney, likely part of the defense team, copied on the email regarding the sealed bail motion submission.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: The presiding judge in the case U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell, to whom the sealed bail motion and exhibits are being submitted.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case (20 Cr. 330 (AIN)) for whom a renewed bail motion is being filed under seal.

connections.description: Everdell is submitting a renewed bail motion on behalf of defendant Ghislaine Maxwell.
Both are attorneys at Cohen & Gresser LLP and are involved in the Maxwell defense case.
Sternheim is listed as defense counsel for Ghislaine Maxwell in the case.
Pagliuca is copied on the defense motion, indicating involvement in Maxwell's legal defense.
Menninger is copied on the defense motion, indicating involvement in Maxwell's legal defense.
Judge Nathan is presiding over the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Renewed Bail Motion Filed Under Seal
events.description: Defense attorneys for Ghislaine Maxwell file a renewed bail motion and accompanying exhibits under seal with the court.

keyFacts: A renewed bail motion for Ghislaine Maxwell was filed under seal on December 8, 2020, in case 20 Cr. 330 (AIN).
The motion was submitted by attorney Christian Everdell of Cohen & Gresser LLP to Judge Nathan and all counsel.
Accompanying exhibits O, P, S, W, and X were submitted in redacted form as part of the sealed filing.
The defense legal team included Mark S. Cohen, Bobbi Sternheim, Jeff Pagliuca, and Laura Menninger.
